description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Walnut Scrolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple & Walnut Scrolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 granny smith apples, peeled, cored and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place milk into a jug with 1 tsp of the sugar. Empty yeast sachet from bread mix into milk. Stir well. Set aside until frothy.
Place bread mix into a large bowl and stir in remaining sugar and mixed spice. Make a well in the centre.

In a small bowl, whisk together egg and vanilla extract. Add to flour mixture with yeast mixture and stir until a dough forms. Cover with plastic wrap and leave in a warm place for 40 minutes until the dough has doubled in size.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 22cm round cake pan with baking paper. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead for 5 minutes until smooth. Roll the dough out to form a large 40x30cm rectangle.

Spread apple and walnuts over dough, leaving a 3cm strip on the far side. Dot butter over apple. Roll pastry longways. Cut into 10x4cm slices. Arrange slices, cut-side up, into pan. Cover with a clean kitchen towel and set aside for 15 minutes.
Transfer pan to oven and bake for 30-35 minutes until golden. Meanwhile sift icing sugar into a small bowl. Add butter, vanilla and enough milk to make a smooth paste. Drizzle over scrolls and serve.
